violations.description: More than 1000 people in a single zone at any time.
violations.recommendation: Reduce the number of people or adjust zones.
Ensure all persons have the correct badges.

violations.description: Unattended bags, weapons, or unknown packages.
All persons in work zones must wear required PPE.
violations.recommendation: Inspect all persons for proper PPE.

report.summary: The observation is non-compliant due to the presence of more than 1000 people in a single zone and persons without proper badges. Additional risks include unattended bags or weapons.
